notes: Backend updates for total ui overhaul.
Maintainers will now receive a notification when Lyzer Web goes down.
Install Scripts and multi distro release support.
Removed constructor data for year 1950->1957 - No constructors championships for these years.
Added all data for 1950-2020 to data files. Users can now browse and view this data.
Fixed a bug where users could not see race results for certain locations.
Initial release of the site with patch notes.
Fixed a bug where Constructor Standings header would display incorrectly.
Added patch notes tab to site.
